blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body:
This is a bunch of text
I'm writing a bunch of text for the sake of the example. I could really go for a pizza. Well, maybe not really. Like a non-greasy pizza would be lovely, but a whole pizza that I know will be greasy? No thank you. Not interested.
However, I could really use some more coffee. I'm going to drink some more of it.
Bliss.
blogs.author: mario
